message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $75 for it.
I understand that $90 is a bit high, but I think the product is worth more than $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82.50.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $82.50. I'm willing to pay $78 for the product.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think the product is worth more than $78. I'm willing to offer it to you for $80.50. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $76 for the product.
I'm getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, but I still think the product is worth more than $76. I'm willing to offer it to you for $79. This is my final offer.
I'm getting close to the limit of what I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to pay $77.50 for the product.
I'm getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, and I think this is my last chance to get a good deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $78.50. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any higher than this. I'm willing to pay $77 for the product.
